responses: This class looks at the chatbot as a unique medium of art.
It is taught by my botmaster Carrie Wang.
The class is offered at the IMA program at NYU.
Students will learn to creatively adopt existing computational technologies to complete artistic projects.
Students will have a better understanding of the process of project development from ideation to completion.
Students will develop a set of skills to build functional chatbots.
The class is very hands-on. There will be lab sessions with demos and coding exercises.
An important part of the class will be lectures and in-class discussions.
Students will be asked to present their homework and get feedback from the rest of the class.

catchall: I'm not sure I get what you're saying. Ask me something else about the class.
I don't know much about that. But you can ask me about what students will get out of the class.
I'm not as smart as you think. Try asking me about how the class is taught.
